message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $18,000 represents its true value, I understand your budget constraints. How about we meet closer to the middle at $14,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $14,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can we meet at this price?
